title: 15YA | Final Preview
body_text:
Well, well.. the weekend is finally here!
Come say hi, take some photos, grab a seat on the sidelines, throw a ball or two, or play the whole time - your presence alone is enough. That said, here's your final ANNIVERSARY XV preview.
And as always, I am eternally grateful for celebratory nights like this. Thank you!
body_html:
Well, well.. the weekend is finally here!

Come say hi, take some photos, grab a seat on the sidelines, throw a ball or two, or play the whole time - your presence alone is enough. That said, here's your final ANNIVERSARY XV preview.

And as always, I am eternally grateful for celebratory nights like this. Thank you!
